document_data.name: Ghost Rod
document_data.mainbody: '''''Ghost rods''''' were a type of [[magical item|magical]] [[staff]].
document_data.Description: ''Ghost rods'' were ornate scepters made of glass with a blue hue.
document_data.Powers: Once per day, a ''ghost rod'' allowed its wielder to turn incorporeal, but not ethereal like a true [[ghost]], for a maximum of one minute and thirty seconds. Under this effect a creature possessed all the associated benefits and drawbacks of being incorporeal, including the capability of hurting any other creature that was also incorporeal.
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Jaranthra Wynkle]] owned a ''ghost rod'' that was gifted to her by [[Elminster]].<ref>{{Cite web/The Coinkind (Part Two)}}
